column1: Little Goat Diner////We ordered the cake of the day
column3: for the 4 kids to split. Moist and super rich! My sister had the Dairy Free Chocolate Shake
column4: which we found to be a bit thick and more similar to the consistency of a ganache. I had to wait over 5 minutes after everyone else's dessert for mine to arrive ... but when it did finally make it to the table
column5: my Pork and Toffee Shake was delish! Huge chunks of Toffee and I thoroughly enjoyed it.
